titleStmt.title: To His Majesty upon his happy arrivall in our late discomposed Albion. By R. Brathwait Esq.
titleStmt.author: Brathwaite, Richard, 1588?-1673.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Henry Brome, at the Gun in Ivie-Lane,
